DOC.brief_summary: Therapist assist , internet-based cognitive behavioral therapy ( TAI-CBT ) show effective patient Generalized Anxiety Disorder ( GAD ) multiple study several country , include : United Kingdom , Australia , Sweden , Netherlands . Despite strong evidence efficacy , TAI-CBT offer USA . TAI-CBT could provide effective alternative face-to-face psychotherapy would expand availability convenience evidence- base treatment anywhere clinical availability limit . The University Florida ( UF ) historically great demand psychotherapy available supply psychotherapy hour result wait list student need receive treatment anxiety . Anxiety disorder interfere memory concentration thus impair academic functioning . Students must wait treatment 3-4 week risk fail course drop school . If TAI-CBT prove effective UF student , provide could increase number student would receive effective timely treatment . This project create 6-8 session therapist assist on-line treatment anxiety disorder . The investigator offer TAI-CBT experimental treatment summer fall , 2013 compare outcomes face-to-face individual therapy , group therapy , wait-list control . The investigator hypothesize student receive TAI-CBT reduction anxiety symptom comparable face-to-face counseling great wait list control .
DOC.detailed_description: Participation restrict currently enrol student University Florida pay health fee , seek treatment anxiety Counseling Wellness Center . Students meet criterion agree participate select two treatment , individual face-to-face therapist assist on-line treatment . Prior session individual therapy , on-line treatment participant complete Behavioral Health Measure-20 normal part treatment CWC . If participant assign Therapist-assisted on-line ( TAO ) treatment he/she ask complete seven module on-line treatment . Each module include interactive , educational material weekly assignment . Subjects may participate on-line discussion forum participant module . The forum use first name pseudonym protect confidentiality . In addition , participant TAO treatment receive 10-20 minute video-conference weekly doctoral level therapist . Therapists review assignment , answer question , help apply educational material contain module subject life . The video conference Adobe Connect . This involve free download computer , tablet , smart phone . Medical record keep ten year , per UF policy . Adobe connect HIPAA HITECH compliant . Research record de-identified use identifier number connect individual participant . Only 2 arm actually use , Face-to-face therapy TAO treatment .
DOC.criteria: student , mild moderate anxiety , appropriate computer equipment Severe depression anxiety , suicidal past 12 month , stable medication least 30 day prior begin study treatment
